article.Heading: GST unlikely to be easy for farmers: ICFA's MJ Khan
article.Summary: Watch the interview of MJ Khan, Chairman at Indian Council of Food and Agriculture (ICFA) with Manisha Gupta on CNBC-TV18, in which he reviews the impact of goods and services tax (GST) on the agricultural commodities and how it would impact the farmers.
article.Body: Watch the interview of MJ Khan, Chairman at Indian Council of Food and Agriculture (ICFA) with Manisha Gupta on CNBC-TV18, in which he reviews the impact of goods and services tax (GST) on the agricultural commodities and how it would impact the farmers.
